concept.title: Accessibility preferences
concept.shortdesc: The following table lists the accessibility preferences for the HCL Sametime Connect Client and Sametime Embedded Client for Notes.

table.title: Accessibility Preferences - com.ibm.collaboration.realtime.accessibility Â plugin release 7.5.x and later

row.entry: Specifies whether or not to optimize chat transcript for screen readers (will replace the transcript with a different format).
Specifies whether or not to optimize notification settings for screen readers (will turn off bring to front, flash window, turn on sounds).
Specifies whether or not to set less verbose messages for screen readers (less verbose will not read status change events and typing events in the chat window).
Specifies whether to use the arrow key for quick find.
